upgrade.0: ATK increased by 12%. For every party member with the same Elemental Type as the wielder (including the wielder themselves), gain 1 Gimmick stack. For every party member with a different Elemental Type from the wielder, gain 1 Theatrics stack. When the wielder has 1/2/3 or more Gimmick stacks, ATK will be increased by 8%/16%/40%. When the wielder has 1/2/3 or more Theatrics stacks, Movement SPD will be increased by 4%/7%/10%.
upgrade.1: ATK increased by 15%. For every party member with the same Elemental Type as the wielder (including the wielder themselves), gain 1 Gimmick stack. For every party member with a different Elemental Type from the wielder, gain 1 Theatrics stack. When the wielder has 1/2/3 or more Gimmick stacks, ATK will be increased by 10%/20%/50%. When the wielder has 1/2/3 or more Theatrics stacks, Movement SPD will be increased by 6%/9%/12%.
upgrade.2: ATK increased by 18%. For every party member with the same Elemental Type as the wielder (including the wielder themselves), gain 1 Gimmick stack. For every party member with a different Elemental Type from the wielder, gain 1 Theatrics stack. When the wielder has 1/2/3 or more Gimmick stacks, ATK will be increased by 12%/24%/60%. When the wielder has 1/2/3 or more Theatrics stacks, Movement SPD will be increased by 8%/11%/14%.
upgrade.3: ATK increased by 21%. For every party member with the same Elemental Type as the wielder (including the wielder themselves), gain 1 Gimmick stack. For every party member with a different Elemental Type from the wielder, gain 1 Theatrics stack. When the wielder has 1/2/3 or more Gimmick stacks, ATK will be increased by 14%/28%/70%. When the wielder has 1/2/3 or more Theatrics stacks, Movement SPD will be increased by 10%/13%/16%.
upgrade.4: ATK increased by 24%. For every party member with the same Elemental Type as the wielder (including the wielder themselves), gain 1 Gimmick stack. For every party member with a different Elemental Type from the wielder, gain 1 Theatrics stack. When the wielder has 1/2/3 or more Gimmick stacks, ATK will be increased by 16%/32%/80%. When the wielder has 1/2/3 or more Theatrics stacks, Movement SPD will be increased by 12%/15%/18%.

upgrade.0: 重击造成的伤害提升16%；队伍中每存在一位与装备者元素类型相同的角色（包括装备者自身），将获得1层「手法」效果；每存在一位元素类型不同的角色，将获得1层「演技」效果。处于1/2/3层及以上「手法」效果下时，攻击力提升16%/32%/48%；处于1/2/3层及以上「演技」效果下时，移动速度提升4%/7%/10%。
upgrade.1: 重击造成的伤害提升20%；队伍中每存在一位与装备者元素类型相同的角色（包括装备者自身），将获得1层「手法」效果；每存在一位元素类型不同的角色，将获得1层「演技」效果。处于1/2/3层及以上「手法」效果下时，攻击力提升20%/40%/60%；处于1/2/3层及以上「演技」效果下时，移动速度提升6%/9%/12%。
upgrade.2: 重击造成的伤害提升24%；队伍中每存在一位与装备者元素类型相同的角色（包括装备者自身），将获得1层「手法」效果；每存在一位元素类型不同的角色，将获得1层「演技」效果。处于1/2/3层及以上「手法」效果下时，攻击力提升24%/48%/72%；处于1/2/3层及以上「演技」效果下时，移动速度提升8%/11%/14%。
upgrade.3: 重击造成的伤害提升28%；队伍中每存在一位与装备者元素类型相同的角色（包括装备者自身），将获得1层「手法」效果；每存在一位元素类型不同的角色，将获得1层「演技」效果。处于1/2/3层及以上「手法」效果下时，攻击力提升28%/56%/84%；处于1/2/3层及以上「演技」效果下时，移动速度提升10%/13%/16%。
upgrade.4: 重击造成的伤害提升32%；队伍中每存在一位与装备者元素类型相同的角色（包括装备者自身），将获得1层「手法」效果；每存在一位元素类型不同的角色，将获得1层「演技」效果。处于1/2/3层及以上「手法」效果下时，攻击力提升32%/64%/96%；处于1/2/3层及以上「演技」效果下时，移动速度提升12%/15%/18%。

upgrade.0: 攻撃力+12%。チーム内に装備者と同じ元素タイプのキャラクター（装備者自身を含む）が1名いる毎に、「手法」効果を1層獲得する。異なる元素タイプのキャラクターが1名いる毎に、「演技」効果を1層獲得する。1/2/3層以上の「手法」効果がある時、攻撃力がそれぞれ+8%/16%/40%。1/2/3層以上の「演技」効果がある時、移動速度がそれぞれ+4%/7%/10%。
